name: Solder Man
description:
You're SOLDERman. Be patient, and assemble circuits steadily, masterfully keeping temperature of your soldering device within a range to achieve best results and provide the best soldering services.

It's short and easy-to-learn puzzle game where you need to find a way to finish a level with certain temperature results soldering circuts and chips in particular order. 

  • Rotate chips around
  • Watch how they interact and influence temperature.
  • Try to find best way to assemble things together
